document_title: Dragon worm disease: Causes, signs, treatment measures
subsection_content: Dragon worms or Guinea worms have the scientific name Dracunculus medinensis. This is the roundest and longest worm among the group of worms that can cause parasitic infections in humans. Adult female dragon worms are 1-2 mm wide and about 70-120 cm long. Male worms are shorter, about 4 cm long. Male dragon worms will die after mating. (first)
subsection_title: benh giun rong.json. What are dragon worms?
subsection_data:
benh giun rong.json. What are dragon worms?
Dragon worms or Guinea worms have the scientific name Dracunculus medinensis. This is the roundest and longest worm among the group of worms that can cause parasitic infections in humans. Adult female dragon worms are 1-2 mm wide and about 70-120 cm long. Male worms are shorter, about 4 cm long. Male dragon worms will die after mating. (first)
